column1: Dr. Fauci Backed Controversial Wuhan Lab with Millions of U.S. Dollars for Risky Coronavirus Research
Imagine... a key outcome of the coronavirus maybe a faster move to even greater automation in food mfg. & meat processing facilities. #UBI

I rarely ever say anything negative about a doctor, but the US & the World deserves a deep proctological exam on exactly what happened in China, & America’s role in funding the coronavirus study. We also need to better understand the WHO dynamic. Trump Admin role???
